movie.title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 1
movie.title_english: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 1
movie.title_long: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 1 (2012)
movie.description_intro: Batman has not been seen for ten years. A new breed of criminal ravages Gotham City, forcing 55-year-old Bruce Wayne back into the cape and cowl. But, does he still have what it takes to fight crime in a new era?
movie.description_full: Batman has not been seen for ten years. A new breed of criminal ravages Gotham City, forcing 55-year-old Bruce Wayne back into the cape and cowl. But, does he still have what it takes to fight crime in a new era?

movies.title: Steel Dawn
movies.summary: In a post-apocalyptic world, a warrior wandering through the desert comes upon a group of settlers who are being menaced by a murderous gang that is after the water they control.
movies.description_full: In a post-apocalyptic world, a warrior wandering through the desert comes upon a group of settlers who are being menaced by a murderous gang that is after the water they control.
movies.synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world, a warrior wandering through the desert comes upon a group of settlers who are being menaced by a murderous gang that is after the water they control.

movies.title: Out of Time
movies.summary: Matt Whitlock, the police chief of the small town of Banyan Key, Florida, is separated from his wife, Alex, a police homicide detective in MIami. Matt's been having an affair with Ann Merai Harrison, a woman who's separated from her abusive husband, Chris, and says she has cancer, as well. When her doctor tells her of a new expensive treatment, Matt decides to give her the nearly half a million dollars in an evidence lock up that he seized from a local drug bust. When Ann and her husband turn up dead only days after naming Chief Whitlock as beneficiary on a million dollar Life insurance policy, things start heating up for Whitlock as the evidence his wife Alex is gathering stacks up against him. And as if things couldn't get worse, the D.E.A. now want the drug money a.s.a.p. Anxiety runs high for Whitlock as he scrambles to figure out who has set him up and also recover half a million dollars all while trying not to break a sweat or draw any suspicions. He's a man who is way out of ...

movies.title: Best of the Best 4: Without Warning
movies.title_english: Best of the Best 4: Without Warning
movies.title_long: Best of the Best 4: Without Warning (1998)
movies.summary: When a girl fleeing Russian mobsters plants a stolen computer disc on Tommy Lee, the martial arts expert finds himself unwittingly thrust into his most harrowing adventure ever. The tiny piece of high-tech software holds the secrets to a counterfeiting scam, and now Tommy is the target of a blood-thirsty mob that will stop at nothing to get it back.
movies.description_full: When a girl fleeing Russian mobsters plants a stolen computer disc on Tommy Lee, the martial arts expert finds himself unwittingly thrust into his most harrowing adventure ever. The tiny piece of high-tech software holds the secrets to a counterfeiting scam, and now Tommy is the target of a blood-thirsty mob that will stop at nothing to get it back.

movies.title: Tom Jones
movies.summary: In eighteenth-century England, "first cousins" Tom Jones and Master Blifil grew up together in privilege in the western countryside, but could not be more different in nature. Tom, the bastard son of one of Squire Allworthy's servants Jenny Jones and the local barber Partridge, was raised by virtuous Allworthy as his own after he sent Jenny away. Tom is randy, chasing anything in a skirt, he's having a sexual relationship on the sly with Molly Seagrim, the peasant daughter of Allworthy's gamekeeper. Tom is nonetheless kind-hearted and good-natured, he who is willing to defend that and those in which he believes. Blifil, on the other hand, is dour, and although outwardly pious, is cold-hearted and vengeful. Despite his randiness, Tom eventually falls in love with Sophie Western, who has just returned to the area after a few years abroad. Despite Sophie's love for Tom, Squire Western and his spinster sister would rather see Sophie marry Blifil rather than a bastard, who Western ...
